keyCharacteristics.description: Inspire and motivate our audience to take control of their health and hydration. Focus on the positive outcomes and benefits of balanced living.
Provide accurate, science-backed information in an easy-to-understand manner. Position BILAN as a trusted authority in electrolyte and hydration science.
keyCharacteristics.do: 'Understand the vital role electrolytes play in cellular function.'
keyCharacteristics.dont: 'Just trust us, our product works wonders.'

keyCharacteristics.description: Foster a sense of community and care. Offer solutions and guidance without being preachy or judgmental. Be a helpful partner in their wellness journey.
keyCharacteristics.do: 'We're here to help you achieve your hydration goals.'

keyCharacteristics.description: Use clear, concise language that resonates with a broad audience. Avoid overly technical jargon. Be friendly and relatable.
keyCharacteristics.dont: 'Optimize your osmolality with our advanced electrolyte matrix.'

keyCharacteristics.description: Be genuine and honest about our products, ingredients, and brand values. Build trust through openness.
keyCharacteristics.do: 'Discover the natural ingredients in every scoop of BILAN.'
keyCharacteristics.dont: 'Our secret formula is unlike anything else.'
